sentence: Coty Inc. ( COTY ) was a big mover last session, as the company saw its shares rise over 19% on the day.

The upside came after the New York Post and the Reuters reported that the company has won the bid to purchase fragrances, make-up and hair brands from The Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) for $12 billion.
This led to more shares changing hands than in a normal session.
This continues yesterday's uptrend for the company - as the stock is now up more than 29% in the past one-month time frame.
The company has seen no estimate revision over the past 30 days, while the Zacks Consensus Estimate remained unchanged.
The recent price action is encouraging though, so make sure to keep a close watch on this firm in the near future.
Coty currently has a Zacks Rank #3 (Hold) while its Earnings ESP is 0.00%.
